install: CREATE TABLE `patch` (`id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `table` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `patch` int(5) NOT NULL, `query` text NOT NULL, `status` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'0', `rollback` text NOT NULL, `rollback_status` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`)) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
